item.title: Will You Save With Fractional Line Services?
item.description:
You might think ordering less bandwidth would save you money, but when it comes to telecom lines, that’s not always the case. While getting a fraction of a T1 line’s capacity seemed like a good idea for those who didn’t need the full 1.5 Mbps, the cost savings weren’t as significant as one might expect. The issue is that the infrastructure for a T1 line, the “pipe,” has a fixed capacity regardless of actual usage...
Read The Full Article :https://Nexus-Security.github.io/will-you-save-with-fractional-line-services/
